Burning Hammer didn't know what was going on. He looked one last time at Di=
nobot and started back towards base. Maybe when that guy wasn't so weak, he=
 could fight him, and maybe break his neck, but not today, it was time to h=
ead back. Burning Hammer was here to assassinate, and so far, his total kil=
ls on this planet equal the same amount of bots the team the Kritzi's had, =
and that team didn't exist and won't ever exist, as far as he knew. Burning=
 Hammer walked back to the Alliance base...
